message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.SY, cs.MA 

The paper discusses the use of reinforcement learning to train agents in team sports games, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The hierarchical approach to training agents also involves machine learning techniques such as deep learning, which is a subfield of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses game theory and the concept of Nash equilibrium, which falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT). The use of multiple agents in the learning process also involves the coordination and communication between agents, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper specifically focuses on multi-agent learning, which is a subfield of machine learning (cs.MA).
